title: Error Page Wireframe
description: A general error page that informs users when something goes wrong, like a 404 or 500 error.

components.name: Header
components.description: Includes logo and site navigation links.

components.name: Error Message
components.description: Displays a generic error message or specific error code.

components.name: Home Button
components.description: Button to navigate back to the home page.

components.name: Footer
components.description: Links to support and help pages.
